vlive.korean: 이건 고문이야 - 너 왜 부끄러워해? It's like torturing. - Why are you so shy? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 혀니비니🐖🐇🦡

vlive.korean: 너무 고문이야. This is such torture. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [몬채널][B] EP.89 C-Festival 2018

vlive.korean: [그건 좀 아닌 듯] 그건 고문 아니야? [I don't think so] Isn't that a torture? 듣기 View video GOT7 : [FULL] Mnet '갓세븐의 하드캐리2' 4화 (GOT7 'HARD CARRY 2' ep.4)
vlive.english: [I don't think so] Isn't that a torture?

vlive.korean: 소리.. 아 소리 고문이라고요? 이것 때문에? The sound... The sound is so torturous? Because of this? 듣기 View video DAY6 : 성진의 목요미식회🍽
vlive.english: The sound... The sound is so torturous? Because of this?
